common.migrate.description: Your phone number is already registered with a Fox.ONE account, but it needs to be migrated before it can be linked to a small wallet. Please go to Fox.ONE APP for account migration.

invite.mine.no-invitees: You have not invited other people
invite.set-success.description: You have successfully joined Fox.ONE and become a member to receive daily treasure chest rewards~
invite.view-rewards.description: Download Fox.ONE APP to view your invitation rewards, explore smart trading, market index and more functions.
tools.instant-trade.subtitle: 15 currency exchanges, 3 seconds transaction
tools.auto-trade.subtitle: Choose a strategy and trade automatically
tools.auto-trade.description: Relentless automated trading machine. Overcoming your weaknesses, everything is very disciplined.
tools.suvery.description: Investment is risky and decisions need to be made with caution. To make money, start by understanding yourself.
tools.usdt-exchange.description: To exchange USDT and other stable currencies.
kyc.title: Verification
kyc.tips.p1: Currently, only mainland residents are supported to complete verification.
kyc.tips.p2: Verification requires access to the phone camera and microphone. Make sure that these two permissions are turned on.
kyc.tips.p3: Verification is done by third-party services (such as FaceID), and your personal information is only used for verification.
kyc.tips.p4: Your personal information will be encrypted and properly processed, and we will not disclose or sell your personal information to other third parties.
kyc.verify-fail-tip: If you can not complete the verification, please scan the QrCode to try again.
kyc.status-text.notyet.p1: To continue to use this service, please perform the verification. Please make the following preparations:
kyc.status-text.notyet.p3: 2. Make sure the camera and microphone permissions are turned on
kyc.status-text.processing.p1: The audit is conducted by a third party and may take 3~5 minutes to complete.
kyc.status-text.processing.p2: After the review is completed, you will receive a notification.
survey.title: Please complete questions
survey.description_1: Investment is risky and decisions need to be made with caution.
survey.description_2: FOX.ONE prioritizes safety, but each person's risk criteria are different.
survey.description_3: The purpose of this survey is to understand your financial situation, investment and risk tolerance. Please read it carefully and complete it objectively in order to confirm your risk appetite, choose the right product, better allocate assets, and achieve your investment goals.
survey.result.overline: Based on the results, you are
survey.result.conservative.description: Hope that the principal is absolutely safe, and can only accept investments with lower risks and price fluctuations to obtain smaller returns.
survey.result.robust.description: It is hoped that the principal risk will be small, and the investment with low to moderate risk and price fluctuation can be accepted to obtain a more stable investment return.
survey.result.balanced.description: Can accept investments with medium to high risks and price fluctuations in pursuit of asset appreciation and current income.
survey.result.growth.description: Can accept the investment of medium to high risk and price fluctuation in order to pursue higher returns and long-term appreciation of assets.
survey.result.radical.description: Can accept high-risk and price fluctuations in order to pursue great returns and asset appreciation.
hfox.start.hint2: Start to draw your smile curve
hfox.plan.preiods.hint.monthly: If the month does not have the date you set, then the fixed vote will be triggered on the last day of the month
hfox.plan.delete.title: Are you sure to delete?
hfox.plan.delete.description: Once deleted, the data will be permanently lost and cannot be recovered. Are you sure to continue?
hfox.plan.schedules.title: From {time} to now
hfox.deposit-subtitle: Please select or enter the deposit amount, then in Fiat or directly pay USDT.
hfox.deposit-confirm-descript: There may be a delay in the recharge to the account.
hfox.withdraw-subtitle: Please make sure you have enough USDT to execute the ongoing fixed investment plan
hfox.increase.processing: Your investment application is being processed. You will receive a notification after success. You can check the purchase status in the scheduled investment record
hfox.increase-hint: Your USDT balance is {balance}, and the limit for single investment is {min} ~ {max} USDT
hfox.schedule.edit.title: Edit
hfox.schedule.import.title: Import
hfox.schedule.upload.title: Upload
hfox.schedule.complete.hint: After uploading the record, new fixed investment chart generation needs to be queued for processing, please be patient.
hfox.schedule.payment-amount: You need to pay {amount} to complete this action.
hfox.schedule.instruction.title: Welcome
hfox.schedule.instruction.text: If you are using the import function for the first time, we recommend that you understand the instructions and charges for the import function. You can also view the instructions through the link at the bottom of the page.
hfox.schedule.leave-hook.title: Save
hfox.schedule.leave-hook.text: Do you want to save the records that have not been submitted?
hfox.schedule.form.date.min: Record is earlyer than two years ago
hfox.check-balance.p1: We promises that it will not operate the funds in your balance without authorization. You can check the authenticity of USDT in your account in the following ways.
hfox.check-balance.p3: The following tokens can be searched directly in {0} to query your current USDT position.
hfox.check-balance.p6: The token is valid for 60 minutes
hfox.check-balance.p8: You can also query asset status by {0}.
trade.instant.subtitle: Use Fox.ONE lightning trading technology to complete the exchange between the two currencies for you as quickly as possible.
trade.instant.introduction-p1: If conditions permit, Fox.ONE will try to exchange more coins for you and spend less.
trade.instant.introduction-p2: Since the currency price and depth are changing in real time, the specific price is subject to the instant transaction price of the lightning transaction.
trade.convert-usdt.subtitle: There may be a slight price difference between different stable currencies, subject to the actual exchange result.
trade.auto.sell.description: The strategy will automatically perform a sell operation according to the set price range and ratio until all are sold or the conditions for execution of the strategy are not met.
trade.auto.sell.price.change.required: Please fill in the percentage below the ASK 1
trade.auto.sell.price.limit.label: The selling price is not lower than:
trade.auto.sell.price.limit.required: Please fill in the lowest price
trade.auto.buy.description: The strategy will automatically carry out the buying operation according to the set price range and proportion, until all the buying or the conditions for the execution of the strategy are not met.
trade.auto.buy.price.change.required: Please fill in the percentage higher than the BID 1
trade.auto.buy.price.limit.label: The purchase price is not higher than
trade.auto.buy.price.limit.required: Please fill in the highest price
trade.auto.no-orders: No automated trading orders in progress
trade.c2c.provider: The legal currency transaction service is provided by ZOTC
trade.c2c.introduction-p1: The purchase will be priced in USDT and use Fox.ONE to exchange the corresponding digital currency for you through smart trading.
trade.c2c.cancel-order.title: Are you sure to cancel the order?
trade.c2c.cancel-order.description: Once the order is cancelled, the other party will not release tokens for you. If you have transferred funds, please cancel your order carefully.
trade.c2c.order-confirmed-tip: It takes 5 to 15 minutes for the seller to confirm the payment status. The coins you have purchased are temporarily locked by the platform. Please rest assured.
trade.c2c.confirm-paid: I have Paid, request to pass coins
trade.c2c.confirm-paid.title: Have you paid the order?
trade.c2c.confirm-paid.description: Have you paid money to the merchant by offline payment such as bank card transfer, Alipay or WeChat? If you have not paid, please do not click the paid button, malicious confirmation will cause the account to freeze.
trade.c2c.help: Something wrong? Join OTC Order Group Consulting
trade.c2c.otc-kyc-error-description: The legal currency transaction is provided by ZOTC. Please go to ZOTC for identity verification. Path: Home - Settings - Identity.
trade.c2c.hfox-order-info-text: The USDT you purchased has been transferred to Regular Invest, please open Regular Invest to check.
trade.enum.trade-strategy-limit.ask: Selling price is not lower than:
trade.enum.trade-strategy-limit.bid: Purchase price is not higher than:
